message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $11,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is still a good deal for you, as you'll be getting the product for less than its worth to you. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. Can you consider that?
